entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 18
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
